alert.note: Alert for Canyonlands, Natural Bridges; Southeast Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 06 at 2:32AM MDT until April 07 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. The lower San Juan River Valley west of Bluff will remain closer to freezing. * WHERE...Southeast Utah and Canyonlands/Natural Bridges. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will impact new and sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing and irrigation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
